ProjectTitle: Hybrid 'Managed Aquifer Recharge' as an adaptation tool to ensure a resilient and healthy groundwater source
InitialFeedbackHistory:
13/03/2025
You are still using an old DMP template. Since 2023 all FWO funded projects should use the standard Flemish DMP, see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp  You will notice that an important difference is the level of detail expected in describing the datasets you generate.
label: good with suggestions
